ref: 12496 śīrṇá ʻ broken ʼ ŚBr., ʻ fallen out ʼ MBh., ʻ withered, rotten ʼ Mn. &rcirclemacr Pk. siṇṇa -- ʻ decayed ʼ; -- MIA. *śīṇa -- (or < *śīna -- 2 s.v. śīˊyatē): Pa. sīna -- ʻ fallen off, destroyed ʼ; N. sinu ʻ corpse ʼ (sina -- m. ʻ body ʼ lex. is sanskritization of NIA. form); M. śīṇ m. ʻ exhaustion ʼ (or < kṣīṇá -- ); Si. huṇu ʻ fallen ʼ (rather than < śanna -- ).
